snippet.title: Hellpit Trailer
snippet.description:
A 3d Platformer where you evade many obstacles and traps lay in front of you.
The game is simple, just jump and move out of your way from danger.
No single traps and obstacles layout are the same.
This game is balanced but can also be raging hard.

Hellpit is out now on itch.io


Credits:
Song used in trailer
Gjallar by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com
Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
Creative Commons CC BY 4.0
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
